lead_paragraph: A woman’s right insole will be affixed to ads in several women’s magazines after a successful test last June.
snippet: A woman’s right insole will be affixed to ads in several women’s magazines after a successful test last June.

headline.main: Dr. Scholl’s Widens Its Insole Campaign
headline.seo: Dr. Scholl’s Expands Its Insole Campaign
headline.print_headline: Dr. Scholl’s Insole Ads Turn Readers Into Wearers
